title: How quickly is Typophile indexed?
content:
To determine how quickly Typophile is indexed by the goog and others I’m including a made up word in this post.

Spiekerfont

The clock is ticking...

 [‹ Help converting PMS 368U to CMYK](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002536/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42244 "Go to previous forum topic") [I am new: here are my 20 favorite serif fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002536/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42181 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content: let us know your results. please. :D

Will do - checking every 1/2 hour or so.

Cheers, Si

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828002536im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Capture_6149.JPG)

Looks like it took about an hour and a half.

Cheers, Si

Not enough accuracy. Do it again, and check every three minutes.

(Just Kidding.)
Couldn’t you have done a cache search instead? Doesn’t that put a time stamp on it?
